     3	                                                                               
     4	                               Vendor Phone List                               
     5	                          and other miscellaneous info                         
     6	                                Release 96.07.18
     7	                                                                               
     8	                                    Copyright                                  
     9	                                   1990 - 1996                                 
    10	                                  by Dan Kyburz                                
    11	                                                                               
    12	                               ALL RIGHTS RESERVED                             
    13	                                                                               
    14	          This list contains commercial, shareware and miscellaneous           
    15	          bulletin boards, vendor sales support, technical support and         
    16	          fax phone numbers I've found useful as the Senior Analyst/           
    17	          Programmer and Operations Manager for a small DP Service             
    18	          Bureau, Computer Consultant, and later as a Senior Network           
    19	          Support Engineer for a major national distributor of computer        
    20	          hardware and software. Many of these numbers have proven             
    21	          personally valuable. Many too have been compiled from industry       
    22	          publications such as Byte, PC Magazine, PC Week, PC World,           
    23	          InfoWorld, Service News, Lan Times, Lan Technology, Lan, Lan         
    24	          Computing, Unix World, Unix Today, Lotus, Data Base Advisor,         
    25	          Computer Language, Dr Dobbs Journal, Computer Shopper,               
    26	          Communications Week, etc.                                            
    27	                                                                               
    28	          Every effort is made to insure the accuracy of this list.            
    29	          Please feel free to distribute this list.  All I ask is that         
    30	          you not charge for this list, nor modify it in any way, except       
    31	          for personal use. Please distribute the original, unmodified         
    32	          list. Send additions, changes and deletions to, Dan Kyburz,          
    33	          PO Box 1225, Palm Harbor, FL 34682-1225 or leave a message on        
    34	          Tech Data Connection bbs at (813) 538-7090, or send e-mail to        
    35	          dkyburz@techdata.com. You can also FAX changes to 813-532-6011.      
    36	                                                                               
    37	                                                                               
    38	          How to get the current version:                                      
    39	                                                                               
    40	          You many download the current list from the Tech Data Connection     
    41	          bbs at 813-538-7090, or The ProData Exchange at 813-920-8820.        
    42	                                                                               
    43	                                       or                                      
    44	                                                                               
    45	          You may now get this file directly from the author's site at:        
    46	          ftp://ftp.techdata.com/pub/dl001100/                                 
    47	                                                                               
    48	          You may also get this file via FTP courtesy of NetWizards at:        
    49	          ftp://ftp.NetWizards.net/pub/vendlist/                               
    50	                                                                               
    51	          (When downloading the file, the file name has the format of          
    52	           VLyymmdd.ZIP, where yy=year, mm=month and dd=day.)                  
    53	                                                                               
    54	                                                                               
    55	          You may access a fully hypertext (HTML) version of this list         
    56	          courtesy of the Walter Shelby Group, Ltd at:                         
    57	          http://www.tile.net./tile/vendors/index.html                         
    58	                                                                               
    59
